narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Applicant is ready for a class C license to exhibit domestic animals (pig, goat, rabbits, donkey and llama). 
A check will be mailed to the regional office for the license fee. No regulated activity may be conducted until the
license fee is processed and a certificate number has been issued. 
Exit interview conducted with applicant at the time of the inspection.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
